title: Bloomberg Markets: Upstream Flows to Downstream Inputs
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Upstream Flows to Downstream Inputs
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson.\u0010\u0010GUEST:\u0010Vincent Catalano\u0010President/Chief Investment Strategist\u0010Blue Marble Research\u0010Discussig why reliance upon experts is a dangerous investment game, a game played by virtually every traditionally-oriented investor. Rob Johnson, President of the Institute for New Economic Thinking, also participates in the discussion.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
